name: playwright_cucumber_framework
description: A ready to use Test Automation Framework using cucumber, playwright and typescript

scripts.test-ui-chrome: cross-env BROWSER=chromium npx cucumber-js --require-module ts-node/register --require features/support/hooks.ts --require features/step_definitions/**/*.ts --tags '@ui' --format html:reports/cucumber-report.html --format json:reports/cucumber_report.json --exit
